cab.content: Thin Document is the Pro pertMilitary Secret,: V 1437 i ..... * ; * 5 FJrjJti Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India, 5792 ^$if ' ltith November 1920.OiHjJP^ (Received 17th, 10 a.m.) Priority A. No. 370, dated 16th November. Reference our telegram No. 331, dated 12th November. Wana column advanced from Jandola on 12th and reached Haidari Kach on 15th, where it will halt for two days while work on road construction proceeds. Shahur Tangi was occupied without opposition, and so far nothing but slight sniping has been encountered, although on 15th enemy were estimated between 100 and 150. Attitude of local Mahsuds markedly friendly, and they are giving full and accurate information about Waziris.
